title: Outlook on Firefox
content: I have noticed that using MS Outlook on Firefox has some issues. Emails sometimes are sent without warning, and text get erased, like the backspace button or arrow button was permanently pushed down. The same issue is not happening using Outlook on MS EDGE or the Outlook App. I do not suspect hacking, so would be good to rule out the option of some issues in the interaction between Windows, Outlook and Firefow, as this issue force me to use Edge.
creator: aaagre

title: color of background
content: Somehow the white color of my Firefox background has now become black. How do I switch back to white?
creator: scienceknows

title: No puedo descargarme Mozilla Firefox
content: Usando el único navegador (Internet explorer) que tengo en mi portátil (HP), no puedo descargarme Mozilla Firefox. Gracias por aconsejarme qué puedo hacer para conseguirlo.
creator: masanhernan

title: accessi account esterni di posta elettronica
content:
Salve, già da anni ho impostato la mia casella di posta "libero" con ulteriori caselle di dominio diverso come secondarie (in modo da accedere a quella di libero e vedere anche tutte le altre) Le password sono memorizzate (quindi sono sicuro che sono esatte)

Da un paio di giorni, accedendo tramite Firefox (che è il mio browser predefinito) non mi è possibile accedere agli account di posta esterni (per esempio: tiscali, aruba ecc...) IMMAGINE 1

Se utilizzo un altro browser (es. Chrome) funziona tutto IMMAGINE 2 allego un paio di screenshots

Cosa posso fare per risolvere il problema ? Ciao Grazie d.c.
creator: quini1

title: password.
content: Ultimamente trovo che il browser sia molto più lento del solito. Inoltre da qualche tempo, ogni tanto compare il messaggio che devo mettere la password. Non è mai successo in tanti anni. Che succede? Grazie
creator: koomaros

title: Firefox PC and Mobile doesn't load this page properly
content:
I have a problem with this website: https://togamas.com/

The search result in this website is not properly displayed by Firefox, either PC or mobile android. I tried using Edge in PC and Chrome in android, and the search result is shown. I don't know why the problem only appear in Firefox.

I put screenshot images of the problem. The one at the top is Firefox, while the bottom one is Edge. The search query is the same, but Firefox doesn't display anything.

Any help?
creator: jleontm

title: Is there any way to set firefox config by active directory group policy?
content:
Hello

I'm Bae, and i'm sorry for my poor English.

I want to make my users be able to use seamless single sign on to Microsoft Azure by setting Firefox config with Active Directory group policy.

First, I created the 'user.js' file and wrote 'user_pref("network.negotiate-auth.trusted-uris","https://autologon.microsoftazuread-sso.com");' and 'user_pref("network.negotiate-auth.delegation-uris","https://autologon.microsoftazuread-sso.com");' in it.

Second, I put this user.js file in the Firefox¥Profiles folder (such as xxx.default-release).

Third, I checked that the setting was changed on about:config.

Last, I also checked that I could use seamless single sign on to "www.office.com".

What I want to do is to distribute this user.js file to my domain users (exactly, to users' firefox profiles folder) by group policy. Please tell me how to do.

Or, if there is any way to set 'network.negotiate-auth.trusted-uris' and 'network.negotiate-auth.delegation-uris' without user.js file, such as Firefox group policy template, please tell me which one I should modify.

Thanks.
creator: sherlocksh

title: Password popup making me insane!!!
content:
I open my browser and close it often during the day. And every time that master password pop up comes up disrupting what I am doing. I often don't notice because I have a mild visual disability and I look down at the keyboard to type longer texts. I can't count how many times I've typed entire paragraphs into that damned box before I notice. This happens ALL the time and I MUST find a way to get rid of this! This is the ONE thing Chrome handles WAY better than FireFox.

How do I make this stop? And if there's no way other than disabling my master password, then FireFox needs to be updated to handle this differently!

Thanks.
creator: diso683r

title: Wont clear internet cache
content:
Having to use Ccleaner to clear my stuff, browser acts like it does it, but doesn't really.

95 64bit Windows 10 Home Version 21H2 Alienware 15R4
creator: markfleener

title: How to disable dark mode!?
content:
Hi! This will sound like an odd question, given that everybody seems to search for the opposite - but how could I DISABLE dark-mode in FF95.00?

I have my whole OS in dark-mode the whole time because of looks. I also installed a dark-mode theme on FF. Because of looks. But after the latest updates, FF decided to present a bunch of my favourite websites in dark-mode, too. Even at daytime - where I use my Computer.

Affected websites are, for example such "unknown" websites like "twitter.com", "spiegel.de" or even "facebook.com". It seems like they use some kind of a flag or token, which decides to use darkmode or not. How do I re-enable the light-mode (is this even a word?), not dependent of my windows / FF settings? Is there an add-on?
creator: marcus.wiedner

title: 'Use autoscrolling' and 'Enable DRM' settings keep being unset
content:
Lately, Firefox unchecks the 'use autoscrolling' and 'play DRM-controlled content' options sometimes (but not every time) when it starts. Other settings don't seem to be affected. It does seem to unset both at once, never one or the other at a time.

I have begun using Firefox routinely on two computers, both signed into the same sync profile. My best guess is that maybe one profile is overwriting the other? Both of these options are set on the second system, but maybe there's something going wrong with the sync?

Thanks, Patrick
creator: patrickking

title: links won't open
content: Why is it that I get emails from Old Navy and other sites, but when I try to open the link, I get a message that they can't find the site or that access is denied.
creator: kelflek

title: Task Manager option missing from profile
content:
I have recently updated directly from v89 to v92.0.2. Since then, I do not have the task manager option in the dropdown menu > More tools. Screenshot attached shows what I mean. This issue does not exist on a new profile if I were to make one, but I am trying my best to avoid transferring everything to a new profile if I have to.

If the only solution is to indeed use a new profile, I would like to know if there's a way to transfer addons and their settings through file copying and pasting.

Thank you for the help!
creator: re11ding

title: two step authenication required
content: My checking account and Gmail require 2 step authentication. I am given the option to have to do this in the future. I do select that option but continue to need this authentication. I contacted my bank bout my checking and was told to use <Microsoft Edge. I used another browser and my problem is resolved. My bank thinks it has to do with security setting in Firefox. I do not have this problem on my Ipad either using apple browser. Google has only recently began requiring this 2 step authentication. I just tried this with Gmail on my Microsoft Edge browser and did not have this problem.' I guess I need change in my Firefox settings but need help. </p>
creator: changed1956
